title: MetaDesign
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321085945/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices)**

Large international design studio started in Berlin by [Erik Spiekermann](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321085945/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Erik%20Spiekermann) in 1979.

The typeface [Meta](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321085945/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Meta) was originally designed for the German Post Office in 1985 and called [PT 55](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321085945/http:/typophile.com/wiki/PT%2055), but never introduced. It was later redigitized for the studio's own communications, then licensed to [FontShop International](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321085945/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontShop%20International) and exploded into one of the best selling and most used typefaces of the 1990s. It is still the best-selling font in the [FontFont](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321085945/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontFont) library.

URL: [http://www.metadesign.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321085945/http:/www.metadesign.com/ "http://www.metadesign.com/")
author: eriks
